message: Let's split it evenly to start, Bob!
I'll take the majority, you can have a small share.
You're taking a big chunk, Bob. I'm offering you a decent share, but I'm not giving up yet!
You're getting desperate, Alice. Time to make a serious offer.
I'm not giving up yet, Bob. I'm willing to compromise, but I need a fair share!
You're running out of time, Alice. Make a serious offer or concede.
This is my last chance, Bob. I'll give you most of it, but I need something for my efforts!
Fine, I'll meet you in the middle, but don't think this is a sign of weakness.
